come,no,farther,the,lordling,warned,<END>
his,voice,cracked,like,a,boy's,<END>
he,threw,the,long,sable,cloak,back,over,his,shoulders,to,free,his,arms,for,battle,and,took,his,sword,in,both,hands,<END>
the,wind,had,stopped,<END>
it,was,very,cold,<END>
the,other,slid,forward,on,silent,feet,<END>
in,its,hand,was,a,longsword,like,none,that,will,had,ever,seen,<END>
no,human,metal,had,gone,into,the,forging,of,that,blade,<END>
it,was,alive,with,moonlight,translucent,a,shard,of,crystal,so,thin,that,it,seemed,almost,to,vanish,when,seen,edge-on,<END>
there,was,a,faint,blue,shimmer,to,the,thing,a,ghost-light,that,played,around,its,edges,and,somehow,will,knew,it,was,sharper,than,any,razor,<END>
ser,waymar,met,him,bravely,<END>
dance,with,me,then,<END>
he,lifted,his,sword,high,over,his,head,defiant,<END>
his,hands,trembled,from,the,weight,of,it,or,perhaps,from,the,cold,<END>
yet,in,that,moment,will,thought,he,was,a,boy,no,longer,but,a,man,of,the,night's,watch,<END>
the,other,halted,<END>
will,saw,its,eyes,blue,deeper,and,bluer,than,any,human,eyes,a,blue,that,burned,like,ice,<END>
they,fixed,on,the,longsword,trembling,on,high,watched,the,moonlight,running,cold,along,the,metal,<END>
for,a,heartbeat,he,dared,to,hope,<END>
they,emerged,silently,from,the,shadows,twins,to,the,first,<END>
three,of,them,four,five,ser,waymar,may,have,felt,the,cold,that,came,with,them,but,he,never,saw,them,never,heard,them,<END>
will,had,to,call,out,<END>
it,was,his,duty,<END>
and,his,death,if,he,did,<END>
he,shivered,and,hugged,the,tree,and,kept,the,silence,<END>
the,pale,sword,came,shivering,through,the,air,<END>
ser,waymar,met,it,with,steel,<END>
when,the,blades,met,there,was,no,ring,of,metal,on,metal,only,a,high,thin,sound,at,the,edge,of,hearing,like,an,animal,screaming,in,pain,<END>
royce,checked,a,second,blow,and,a,third,then,fell,back,a,step,<END>
another,flurry,of,blows,and,he,fell,back,again,<END>
behind,him,to,right,to,left,all,around,him,the,watchers,stood,patient,faceless,silent,the,shifting,patterns,of,their,delicate,armor,making,them,all,but,invisible,in,the,wood,<END>
yet,they,made,no,move,to,interfere,<END>
again,and,again,the,swords,met,until,will,wanted,to,cover,his,ears,against,the,strange,anguished,keening,of,their,clash,<END>

his,blade,was,white,with,frost,the,other's,danced,with,pale,blue,light,<END>
then,royce's,parry,came,a,beat,too,late,<END>
the,pale,sword,bit,through,the,ringmail,beneath,his,arm,<END>
the,young,lord,cried,out,in,pain,<END>

ser,waymar,royce,found,his,fury,<END>
for,robert,<END>

when,the,blades,touched,the,steel,shattered,<END>

will,closed,his,eyes,<END>
far,beneath,him,he,heard,their,voices,and,laughter,sharp,as,icicles,<END>

a,boy,<END>
he,found,what,was,left,of,the,sword,a,few,feet,away,the,end,splintered,and,twisted,like,a,tree,struck,by,lightning,<END>

bran,<END>

he,could,do,nothing,but,nurse,his,resentment,so,nurse,it,he,did,his,mood,growing,blacker,by,the,hour,at,each,insult,to,his,person,<END>

her,brother,had,told,her,to,smile,and,so,she,smiled,until,her,face,ached,and,the,tears,came,unbidden,to,her,eyes,<END>

well,now,i,know,jaime's,dark,sin,and,the,matter,can,be,forgotten,<END>
i,am,heartily,sick,of,secrets,and,squabbles,and,matters,of,state,ned,<END>
it's,all,as,tedious,as,counting,coppers,<END>
come,let's,ride,you,used,to,know,how,<END>
i,want,to,feel,the,wind,in,my,hair,again,<END>
he,kicked,his,horse,back,into,motion,and,galloped,up,over,the,barrow,raining,earth,down,behind,him,<END>
for,a,moment,ned,did,not,follow,<END>
he,had,run,out,of,words,and,he,was,filled,with,a,vast,sense,of,helplessness,<END>
not,for,the,first,time,he,wondered,what,he,was,doing,here,and,why,he,had,come,<END>
he,was,no,jon,arryn,to,curb,the,wildness,of,his,king,and,teach,him,wisdom,<END>

a,man,could,not,always,be,where,he,belonged,though,<END>
resigned,eddard,stark,put,his,boots,into,his,horse,and,set,off,after,the,king,<END>
tyrion,<END>
the,north,went,on,forever,<END>
tyrion,lannister,knew,the,maps,as,well,as,anyone,but,a,fortnight,on,the,wild,track,that,passed,for,the,kingsroad,up,here,had,brought,home,the,lesson,that,the,map,was,one,thing,and,the,land,quite,another,<END>
they,had,left,winterfell,on,the,same,day,as,the,king,amidst,all,the,commotion,of,the,royal,departure,riding,out,to,the,sound,of,men,shouting,and,horses,snorting,to,the,rattle,of,wagons,and,the,groaning,of,the,queen's,huge,wheelhouse,as,a,light,snow,flurried,about,them,<END>

there,the,banners,and,the,wagons,and,the,columns,of,knights,and,freeriders,turned,south,taking,the,tumult,with,them,while,tyrion,turned,north,with,benjen,stark,and,his,nephew,<END>
it,had,grown,colder,after,that,and,far,more,quiet,<END>
west,of,the,road,were,flint,hills,grey,and,rugged,with,tall,watchtowers,on,their,stony,summits,<END>
to,the,east,the,land,was,lower,the,ground,flattening,to,a,rolling,plain,that,stretched,away,as,far,as,the,eye,could,see,<END>
stone,bridges,spanned,swift,narrow,rivers,while,small,farms,spread,in,rings,around,holdfasts,walled,in,wood,and,stone,<END>
the,road,was,well,trafficked,and,at,night,for,their,comfort,there,were,rude,inns,to,be,found,<END>
three,days,ride,from,winterfell,however,the,farmland,gave,way,to,dense,wood,and,the,kingsroad,grew,lonely,<END>

when,the,wind,blew,from,the,north,long,plumes,of,ice,crystals,flew,from,the,high,peaks,like,banners,<END>
with,the,mountains,a,wall,to,the,west,the,road,veered,north,by,northeast,through,the,wood,a,forest,of,oak,and,evergreen,and,black,brier,that,seemed,older,and,darker,than,any,tyrion,had,ever,seen,<END>
the,wolfswood,benjen,stark,called,it,and,indeed,their,nights,came,alive,with,the,howls,of,distant,packs,and,some,not,so,distant,<END>

yoren,was,stooped,and,sinister,his,features,hidden,behind,a,beard,as,black,as,his,clothing,but,he,seemed,as,tough,as,an,old,root,and,as,hard,as,stone,<END>

and,to,you,singer,catelyn,returned,<END>

in,the,end,it,came,down,to,four,the,hound,and,his,monstrous,brother,gregor,jaime,lannister,the,kingslayer,and,ser,loras,tyrell,the,youth,they,called,the,knight,of,flowers,<END>

at,sixteen,he,was,the,youngest,rider,on,the,field,yet,he,had,unhorsed,three,knights,of,the,kingsguard,that,morning,in,his,first,three,jousts,<END>
sansa,had,never,seen,anyone,so,beautiful,<END>
his,plate,was,intricately,fashioned,and,enameled,as,a,bouquet,of,a,thousand,different,flowers,and,his,snow-white,stallion,was,draped,in,a,blanket,of,red,and,white,roses,<END>
after,each,victory,ser,loras,would,remove,his,helm,and,ride,slowly,round,the,fence,and,finally,pluck,a,single,white,rose,from,the,blanket,and,toss,it,to,some,fair,maiden,in,the,crowd,<END>

but,with,the,khal,off,hunting,it,was,pleasant,to,lie,back,on,soft,cushions,and,be,carried,across,vaes,dothrak,with,red,silk,curtains,to,shield,her,from,the,sun,<END>
ser,jorah,saddled,up,and,rode,beside,her,with,the,four,young,men,of,her,khas,and,her,handmaids,<END>
the,day,was,warm,and,cloudless,the,sky,a,deep,blue,<END>
when,the,wind,blew,she,could,smell,the,rich,scents,of,grass,and,earth,<END>
as,her,litter,passed,beneath,the,stolen,monuments,she,went,from,sunlight,to,shadow,and,back,again,<END>
dany,swayed,along,studying,the,faces,of,dead,heroes,and,forgotten,kings,<END>
she,wondered,if,the,gods,of,burned,cities,could,still,answer,prayers,<END>
if,i,were,not,the,blood,of,the,dragon,she,thought,wistfully,this,could,be,my,home,<END>
she,was,khaleesi,she,had,a,strong,man,and,a,swift,horse,handmaids,to,serve,her,warriors,to,keep,her,safe,an,honored,place,in,the,dosh,khaleen,awaiting,her,when,she,grew,old,and,in,her,womb,grew,a,son,who,would,one,day,bestride,the,world,<END>
that,should,be,enough,for,any,woman,but,not,for,the,dragon,<END>
with,viserys,gone,daenerys,was,the,last,the,very,last,<END>
she,was,the,seed,of,kings,and,conquerors,and,so,too,the,child,inside,her,<END>
she,must,not,forget,<END>
the,western,market,was,a,great,square,of,beaten,earth,surrounded,by,warrens,of,mud-baked,brick,animal,pens,whitewashed,drinking,halls,<END>
hummocks,rose,from,the,ground,like,the,backs,of,great,subterranean,beasts,breaking,the,surface,yawning,black,mouths,leading,down,to,cool,and,cavernous,storerooms,below,<END>
the,interior,of,the,square,was,a,maze,of,stalls,and,crookback,aisles,shaded,by,awnings,of,woven,grass,<END>
a,hundred,merchants,and,traders,were,unloading,their,goods,and,setting,up,in,stalls,when,they,arrived,yet,even,so,the,great,market,seemed,hushed,and,deserted,compared,to,the,teeming,bazaars,that,dany,remembered,from,pentos,and,the,other,free,cities,<END>
the,caravans,made,their,way,to,vaes,dothrak,from,east,and,west,not,so,much,to,sell,to,the,dothraki,as,to,trade,with,each,other,ser,jorah,had,explained,<END>
the,riders,let,them,come,and,go,unmolested,so,long,as,they,observed,the,peace,of,the,sacred,city,did,not,profane,the,mother,of,mountains,or,the,womb,of,the,world,and,honored,the,crones,of,the,dosh,khaleen,with,the,traditional,gifts,of,salt,silver,and,seed,<END>
the,dothraki,did,not,truly,comprehend,this,business,of,buying,and,selling,<END>
dany,liked,the,strangeness,of,the,eastern,market,too,with,all,its,queer,sights,and,sounds,and,smells,<END>
she,often,spent,her,mornings,there,nibbling,tree,eggs,locust,pie,and,green,noodles,listening,to,the,high,ululating,voices,of,the,spellsingers,gaping,at,manticores,in,silver,cages,and,immense,grey,elephants,and,the,striped,black-and-white,horses,of,the,jogos,nhai,<END>
she,enjoyed,watching,all,the,people,too,dark,solemn,asshai'i,and,tall,pale,qartheen,the,bright-eyed,men,of,yi,ti,in,monkey-tail,hats,warrior,maids,from,bayasabhad,shamyriana,and,kayakayanaya,with,iron,rings,in,their,nipples,and,rubies,in,their,cheeks,even,the,dour,and,frightening,shadow,men,who,covered,their,arms,and,legs,and,chests,with,tattoos,and,hid,their,faces,behind,masks,<END>

a,heartbeat,two,four,and,suddenly,it,was,as,if,she,and,her,protectors,were,alone,in,the,wood,<END>

no,horse,had,ever,been,seen,on,this,side,of,the,narrow,sea,<END>
no,doubt,the,children,were,as,frightened,by,the,horses,as,the,first,men,were,by,the,faces,in,the,trees,<END>

horror-struck,the,children,went,to,war,<END>
the,old,songs,say,that,the,greenseers,used,dark,magics,to,make,the,seas,rise,and,sweep,away,the,land,shattering,the,arm,but,it,was,too,late,to,close,the,door,<END>
the,wars,went,on,until,the,earth,ran,red,with,blood,of,men,and,children,both,but,more,children,than,men,for,men,were,bigger,and,stronger,and,wood,and,stone,and,obsidian,make,a,poor,match,for,bronze,<END>
finally,the,wise,of,both,races,prevailed,and,the,chiefs,and,heroes,of,the,first,men,met,the,greenseers,and,wood,dancers,amidst,the,weirwood,groves,of,a,small,island,in,the,great,lake,called,gods,eye,<END>

when,a,horselord,dies,his,horse,is,slain,with,him,so,he,might,ride,proud,into,the,night,lands,<END>
the,bodies,are,burned,beneath,the,open,sky,and,the,khal,rises,on,his,fiery,steed,to,take,his,place,among,the,stars,<END>
the,more,fiercely,the,man,burned,in,life,the,brighter,his,star,will,shine,in,the,darkness,<END>

there,he,said,in,a,hushed,voice,<END>

the,first,star,was,a,comet,burning,red,<END>
bloodred,fire,red,the,dragon's,tail,<END>
she,could,not,have,asked,for,a,stronger,sign,<END>
dany,took,the,torch,from,aggo's,hand,and,thrust,it,between,the,logs,<END>
the,oil,took,the,fire,at,once,the,brush,and,dried,grass,a,heartbeat,later,<END>
tiny,flames,went,darting,up,the,wood,like,swift,red,mice,skating,over,the,oil,and,leaping,from,bark,to,branch,to,leaf,<END>
a,rising,heat,puffed,at,her,face,soft,and,sudden,as,a,lover's,breath,but,in,seconds,it,had,grown,too,hot,to,bear,<END>
dany,stepped,backward,<END>
the,wood,crackled,louder,and,louder,<END>

the,flames,whirled,and,writhed,racing,each,other,up,the,platform,<END>
the,dusk,shimmered,as,the,air,itself,seemed,to,liquefy,from,the,heat,<END>
dany,heard,logs,spit,and,crack,<END>
the,fires,swept,over,mirri,maz,duur,<END>
her,song,grew,louder,shriller,then,she,gasped,again,and,again,and,her,song,became,a,shuddering,wail,thin,and,high,and,full,of,agony,<END>
and,now,the,flames,reached,her,drogo,and,now,they,were,all,around,him,<END>
his,clothing,took,fire,and,for,an,instant,the,khal,was,clad,in,wisps,of,floating,orange,silk,and,tendrils,of,curling,smoke,grey,and,greasy,<END>
dany's,lips,parted,and,she,found,herself,holding,her,breath,<END>
part,of,her,wanted,to,go,to,him,as,ser,jorah,had,feared,to,rush,into,the,flames,to,beg,for,his,forgiveness,and,take,him,inside,her,one,last,time,the,fire,melting,the,flesh,from,their,bones,until,they,were,as,one,forever,<END>
she,could,smell,the,odor,of,burning,flesh,no,different,than,horseflesh,roasting,in,a,firepit,<END>
the,pyre,roared,in,the,deepening,dusk,like,some,great,beast,drowning,out,the,fainter,sound,of,mirri,maz,duur's,screaming,and,sending,up,long,tongues,of,flame,to,lick,at,the,belly,of,the,night,<END>
as,the,smoke,grew,thicker,the,dothraki,backed,away,coughing,<END>
huge,orange,gouts,of,fire,unfurled,their,banners,in,that,hellish,wind,the,logs,hissing,and,cracking,glowing,cinders,rising,on,the,smoke,to,float,away,into,the,dark,like,so,many,newborn,fireflies,<END>
the,heat,beat,at,the,air,with,great,red,wings,driving,the,dothraki,back,driving,off,even,mormont,but,dany,stood,her,ground,<END>
she,was,the,blood,of,the,dragon,and,the,fire,was,in,her,<END>
she,had,sensed,the,truth,of,it,long,ago,dany,thought,as,she,took,a,step,closer,to,the,conflagration,but,the,brazier,had,not,been,hot,enough,<END>
the,flames,writhed,before,her,like,the,women,who,had,danced,at,her,wedding,whirling,and,singing,and,spinning,their,yellow,and,orange,and,crimson,veils,fearsome,to,behold,yet,lovely,so,lovely,alive,with,heat,<END>
dany,opened,her,arms,to,them,her,skin,flushed,and,glowing,<END>
this,is,a,wedding,too,she,thought,<END>

she,saw,crimson,firelions,and,great,yellow,serpents,and,unicorns,made,of,pale,blue,flame,she,saw,fish,and,foxes,and,monsters,wolves,and,bright,birds,and,flowering,trees,each,more,beautiful,than,the,last,<END>

yes,my,love,my,sun-and-stars,yes,mount,now,ride,now,<END>
